content: NEW YORK  Jan 23 Timkensteel Corp  a producer of high-quality steel used in products ranging from oil rigs to fighter jets  looks to be an attractive takeover candidate as its shares slide  said Eric Marshall  lead portfolio manager of the $1.3 billion Hodges Small Cap fund.
name: Timken Company (The)
title: Seeing Timkensteel as takeover candidate  Hodges fund buys its shares
